extensionDescription.message: Block promoted contents including tweets, trends, and, follows, hide more annoying contents, switch to Latest Tweets for home page on Twitter.

optionHideTimelineSuggestionTweet.message: Hide suggestion tweets on timeline (e.g. Someone liked tweet)

optionHideTimelineModule.message: Hide modules on timeline (e.g. Who To Follow)

optionUseLatestTimeline.message: Always show Latest Tweets instead of top Tweets
